mapper.select: select id, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, dict_code, dict_desc, category_code, category_desc, sort_no, data_type, remark, locate_code, version, enabled, do_secret from star_nft_dict where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into star_nft_dict(id, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, dict_code, dict_desc, category_code, category_desc, sort_no, data_type, remark, locate_code, version, enabled, do_secret) values (#{id}, #{isDeleted}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedAt}, #{modifiedBy}, #{dictCode}, #{dictDesc}, #{categoryCode}, #{categoryDesc}, #{sortNo}, #{dataType}, #{remark}, #{locateCode}, #{version}, #{enabled}, #{doSecret})

insert into star_nft_dict(id,is_deleted,created_at,created_by,modified_at,modified_by,dict_code,dict_desc,category_code,category_desc,sort_no,data_type,remark,locate_code,version ,enabled,do_secret) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.isDeleted},#{entity.createdAt},#{entity.createdBy},#{entity.modifiedAt},#{entity.modifiedBy},#{entity.dictCode},#{entity.dictDesc},#{entity.categoryCode},#{entity.categoryDesc},#{entity.sortNo},#{entity.dataType},#{entity.remark},#{entity.locateCode},#{entity.version} ,#{entity.enabled},#{entity.doSecret})
on duplicate key update id=values(id), is_deleted=values(is_deleted), created_at=values(created_at), created_by=values(created_by), modified_at=values(modified_at), modified_by=values(modified_by), dict_code=values(dict_code), dict_desc=values(dict_desc), category_code=values(category_code), category_desc=values(category_desc), sort_no=values(sort_no), data_type=values(data_type), remark=values(remark), locate_code=values(locate_code), version=values(version), enabled=values(enabled), do_secret=values(do_secret)
mapper.update:
update star_nft_dict
id = #{id},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
created_at = #{createdAt},
created_by = #{createdBy},
modified_at = #{modifiedAt},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy},
dict_code = #{dictCode},
dict_desc = #{dictDesc},
category_code = #{categoryCode},
category_desc = #{categoryDesc},
sort_no = #{sortNo},
data_type = #{dataType},
remark = #{remark},
locate_code = #{locateCode},
version = #{version},
enabled = #{enabled},
do_secret = #{doSecret},
where id = #{id}
